What To Expect with a Consultation

Together we will go item-by-item and consider if it sparks joy™

1

Discuss The Project

Reach out to a consultant and determine the scope of the project.

2

Commit and Envision

Image your ideal lifestyle and commit to the process.

3

Apply the KonMari Method™ to Minimalism

Together you will tidy category-by-category.

4

Set Goals

Now that you only have items that spark joy™, you and your consultant will set a path to continue a clutter-free home.
